name: context1000
description: Architecture analysis and documentation management plugin for context1000 framework

agents.name: architecture-analyzer
agents.description: Analyzes codebase architecture and automatically generates ADRs and RFCs

agents.name: doc-consistency-checker
agents.description: Validates and maintains consistency across context1000 documentation

commands.name: create-adr
commands.description: Create a new Architecture Decision Record

commands.name: create-rfc
commands.description: Create a new Request for Comments
